Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a design that shows a problem of people needing to communicate over a long distance.
The student can create a drawing of a device, using string and cups, that can send and receive information using sound.
The student can include in their drawing how the device uses string to connect two points for communication.
The student can show in the drawing how sound helps people communicate over the distance.
The student can label the parts of the design in their drawing that are important for communication, such as the cups and string.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing only the materials they used, like string and paper cups, as provided for the task.
